detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract CustomToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__14.sol#227-238) has payable functions:
	 - AirdropToken.airdrop() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__14.sol#201-215)
	 - CustomToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__14.sol#235-237)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [CustomToken](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__14.sol#L227-L238) has payable functions:
	 - [AirdropToken.airdrop()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__14.sol#L201-L215)
	 - [CustomToken.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__14.sol#L235-L237)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description:
AirdropToken.airdrop() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__14.sol#201-215) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= airBegintime && block.timestamp <= airEndtime) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__14.sol#202)
detectors.markdown:
[AirdropToken.airdrop()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__14.sol#L201-L215) uses timestamp for comparisons
